common.chatroom

Interface IChatroomToChatroomAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatroomToChatroomAdapter

    public interface IChatroomToChatroomAdapter
extends java.io.Serializable
    Adapter to a chatroom instance. There is one adapter for each instance of a chatroom for each user.
    Author:
    Derek Peirce, Jake Kornblau

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      Determines if two IChatroomToChatroomAdapters are equal.
      IChatroomID getChatroomID()
      Gets the ID of the chatroom this adapter adapts
      IUser getUser()
      Gets the user on the other end of the adapter
      int hashCode()
      Two IChatroomToChatroomAdapters must return the same hash code if they are equal according to the equals function.
      DataPacket<? extends IChatMessage> sendChatroomMessage(DataPacket<? extends IChatMessage> message, IChatroomToChatroomAdapter sendingAdapter)
      Sends the message to the other chatroom

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        IUser getUser()
        Gets the user on the other end of the adapter
        Returns:
        user at the other end of the adapter

      • getChatroomID

        IChatroomID getChatroomID()
        Gets the ID of the chatroom this adapter adapts
        Returns:
        the chatroom ID

      • sendChatroomMessage

        DataPacket<? extends IChatMessage> sendChatroomMessage(DataPacket<? extends IChatMessage> message,
                                                       IChatroomToChatroomAdapter sendingAdapter)
                                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends the message to the other chatroom
        Parameters:
        message - a DataPacket containing the message to be send to the other chatroom
        sendingAdapter - the IChatroomToChatroomAdapter for this adapter.
        Returns:
        A DataPacket containing an IChatroomMessage with the response of sending the message.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there was an exception in trying to remotely send the message to the IChatroomToChatroomAdapter.

      • equals

        boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Determines if two IChatroomToChatroomAdapters are equal. Instances must still retain their original equality even after multiple deserialzation.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the Object to determine equality to.
        Returns:
        a boolean true o

      • hashCode

        int hashCode()
        Two IChatroomToChatroomAdapters must return the same hash code if they are equal according to the equals function.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the integer hash-code for this IChatroomToChatroomAdapter
